dmca.title: Golden Gate Expeditions Complaint to Web Host
dmca.body:
This was a dispute between former partners. The recipient of this letter reports that he moved the content to his own server (rather than a hosted server) and got a favorable settlement in the lawsuit against him.
Hello [Private] :-) This is the email that we recvd, Best Regards [Private] ADDR Technical support support@addr.com www.addr.com
Wed Feb 12 18:06:44 2003 From: [Private] To: Cc: , Subject: DMCA INFRINGEMENT CLAIM Date: Wed, 12 Feb 2003 09:08:00 -0800 February 12, 2003 DMCA Agent Via email and Fax [Private] addr.com [Private] Re: DMCA Infringement Claim: sharkdiver.com To Whom it May Concern: This law firm represents Golden Gate Expeditions and [Private]. We are writing to request that addr.com expeditiously remove or disable access to infringing material it is hosting on its servers for the referenced domain, sharkdiver.com. A diligent search has failed to uncover addr.com's designated agent for DMCA claims. You are obligated to pass this demand on to the individual or individuals tasked with handling claims of copyright infringement. We thank you in advance for doing so. Sharkdiver.com contains at least nineteen (19) photographs taken by [Private]. Our client, Golden Gate Expeditions, is the exclusive licensee of the images and, as such, has standing to bring an action for copyright infringement. 17 U.S.C.
